title: Use colorful original social icons with links and remove duplicate social icons at the bottom

requirements.text: Ensure the only “Follow Us” social icon set in the UI is the existing footer social section (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) using SOCIAL_LINKS (frontend/src/constants/socialLinks.ts), and do not add or keep an additional social icon row at the bottom of the landing page.

quotes: No i just want to social Icons colorful original with links not to add all new at bottom

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page (frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx) no longer renders its own separate “Follow Us” icon row in the Contact section.
Footer remains the single source of social icons via SOCIAL_LINKS mapping.
No other page introduces an additional, duplicate social icons row at the bottom of the page.

requirements.text: Make the footer social icons appear as colorful, original/official full-color platform icons and ensure each icon click opens the correct outbound link behavior defined in frontend/src/constants/socialLinks.ts (including deep-link fallback behavior).

quotes: social Icons colorful original with links

acceptanceCriteria: Footer “Follow Us” icons display as full-color (not monochrome) and are consistently sized/aligned.
Each footer icon opens the exact URL defined in SOCIAL_LINKS; deep-link items attempt deep-link first and fall back to opening the web URL.
All social icons in the footer are keyboard-focusable and have appropriate aria-labels (already provided by SOCIAL_LINKS).

requirements.text: Remove unused social-icon dependencies/imports from frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx after removing the duplicated social icons section (e.g., react-icons imports) to keep the bundle clean.

quotes: not to add all new at bottom

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx no longer imports unused social icon components (e.g., SiFacebook/SiInstagram/SiLinkedin/SiYoutube) if they are not rendered anywhere in that page.
The frontend builds without lint/type errors related to unused imports.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Keep social link URLs and behaviors defined in frontend/src/constants/socialLinks.ts as the source of truth for footer social navigation.
nonGoals: Adding new social platforms beyond the existing set in SOCIAL_LINKS.
Changing backend logic or storing social links in the backend.
